name: Colonel Perceptron's Bootcamp
description:
This is an entry for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. It is a puzzle game where you only have a fixed number of controls available, which you also need to combine together to overcome the obstacles placed in your way. If you are not careful, you will run out of controls before reaching the goal!

All sprites were created during the Jam. Sound Effects are from https://harvey656.itch.io/8-bit-game-sound-effects-collection

I will probably add additional levels with more interesting puzzles sometime in the future.
